issue.title: [Developer][Integration] Add integration tests for duplicate field names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8027](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8027). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Schemas and nested types whose fields' names are not unique are permitted, so the integration tests should include a case which exercises these.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8027?focusedCommentId=17060577) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6636
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6636>
